item.title: My First Post
item.description: deneme async def do_http_req(): async with aiohttp.ClientSession() as session: async with session.get('http://python.org') as response: print("Status:", response.status) print("Content-type:", response.headers['content-type']) html = await response.text() print("Body:", html[:15], "...")
